long_description: This Park Tool's specially designed brush is made for cleaning bike components and drivetrains. Features a comfortable, large handle with a curved teeth edge for reaching deeply embedded dirt between the gears. Tough nylon bristles allow easy cleaning of the derailleur and chain. Saves wear and tear on your chain and freewheel; extend the life and performance of your components. Portable size to take along on rides for quick, on-the-spot cleaning.
short_description: This Park Tool's specially designed brush is made for cleaning bike components and drivetrains.
